languages.text: {n}Мутант изрыгает витиеватое проклятие вполголоса, однако тут же бросает на вас испуганный взгляд и замолкает. Кажется, один вид Звездного Сиятельства нагоняет на простых смертных с Тассеры священный ужас.{/n}

{n}The mutant utters a foul curse under his breath, then immediately gives you a frightened look and falls silent. The mere sight of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} seems to instil a reverent awe in the common denizens of Thassera.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мутант изрыгает витиеватое проклятие вполголоса, однако тут же бросает на вас испуганный взгляд и замолкает. Кажется, один вид Звездного Сиятельства нагоняет на простых смертных с Тассеры священный ужас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The mutant mouths a foul curse, but immediately gives you a frightened look and falls silent. The mere sight of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} seems to instil a reverent awe in the lowborn commoners of Thassera.{/n}

{n}The mutant mouths a foul curse, but immediately gives you a frightened look and falls silent. The mere sight of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} seems to instil a reverent awe in the lowborn commoners of Thassera.{/n}

{n}The mutant utters a foul curse under his breath, then immediately gives you a frightened look and falls silent. The mere sight of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} seems to instil a reverent awe in the lowborn commoners of Thassera.{/n}

{n}The mutant utters a foul curse under his breath, then immediately gives you a frightened look and falls silent. The mere sight of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} seems to instil a reverent awe in the lowborn commoners of Thassera.{/n}

{n}The mutant utters a foul curse under his breath, then immediately gives you a frightened look and falls silent. The mere sight of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} seems to instil a reverent awe in the common denizens of Thassera.{/n}

{n}The mutant utters a foul curse under his breath, then immediately gives you a frightened look and falls silent. The mere sight of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} seems to instil a reverent awe in the common denizens of Thassera.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那个变种人低声咒骂了一句，看了你一眼。随后，他的表情立刻变得惊恐不已，一言不发。仅仅是看到你这位来自文明世界的大人物，就让塔瑟拉的普通居民充满了虔诚的敬畏。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant utters a foul curse under his breath, then immediately gives you a frightened look and falls silent. The mere sight of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} seems to instil a reverent awe in the common denizens of Thassera.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那个变种人低声咒骂了一句，看了你一眼。随后，他的表情立刻变得惊恐不已，一言不发。仅仅是看到你这位来自文明世界的大人物，就让塔瑟拉的普通居民充满了虔诚的敬畏。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El mutante profiere una grosera imprecación entre dientes, y enseguida te mira asustado y guarda silencio. La mera imagen {mf|del Señor|de la Señora} Celestial parece infundir un respeto reverencial en el pueblo llano de Thassera.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant utters a foul curse under his breath, then immediately gives you a frightened look and falls silent. The mere sight of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} seems to instil a reverent awe in the common denizens of Thassera.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El mutante profiere una grosera imprecación entre dientes, y enseguida te mira asustado y guarda silencio. La mera imagen {mf|del Señor|de la Señora} Celestial parece infundir un respeto reverencial en el pueblo llano de Thassera.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mutant, nefesi altında pis bir küfür mırıldanıp ardından sana korku dolu bir bakış atıyor ve susuyor. Semavi {mf|Lordunun|Leydisinin} yalnızca görüntüsü bile Thassera'nın sıradan sakinlerine saygı dolu bir huşu aşılıyor gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant utters a foul curse under his breath, then immediately gives you a frightened look and falls silent. The mere sight of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} seems to instil a reverent awe in the common denizens of Thassera.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mutant, nefesi altında pis bir küfür mırıldanıp ardından sana korku dolu bir bakış atıyor ve susuyor. Semavi {mf|Lordunun|Leydisinin} yalnızca görüntüsü bile Thassera'nın sıradan sakinlerine saygı dolu bir huşu aşılıyor gibi görünüyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その変異体は、小声で汚らしい呪いの言葉を発してから、すぐに怯えた目であなたを見て、黙り込む。天の{mf|君|姫}を見ただけで、タッセーラの居住者の中に畏敬の念が植え付けられるようである。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant utters a foul curse under his breath, then immediately gives you a frightened look and falls silent. The mere sight of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} seems to instil a reverent awe in the common denizens of Thassera.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その変異体は、小声で汚らしい呪いの言葉を発してから、すぐに怯えた目であなたを見て、黙り込む。天の{mf|君|姫}を見ただけで、タッセーラの居住者の中に畏敬の念が植え付けられるようである。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le mutant marmonne un juron obscène, puis il vous adresse un regard empli d'effroi et se mure dans le silence. La seule vue de Sa Céleste Seigneurie semble inspirer aux citoyens ordinaires de Thassera un sentiment de respect mêlé de crainte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant utters a foul curse under his breath, then immediately gives you a frightened look and falls silent. The mere sight of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} seems to instil a reverent awe in the common denizens of Thassera.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le mutant marmonne un juron obscène, puis il vous adresse un regard empli d'effroi et se mure dans le silence. La seule vue de Sa Céleste Seigneurie semble inspirer aux citoyens ordinaires de Thassera un sentiment de respect mêlé de crainte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Mutant stößt leise einen schändlichen Fluch aus, blickt dich dann aber sofort verängstigt an und verstummt. Der bloße Anblick {mf|des himmlischen Herren|der himmlischen Herrin} scheint in den einfachen Bürgern von Thassera große Ehrfurcht zu wecken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant utters a foul curse under his breath, then immediately gives you a frightened look and falls silent. The mere sight of the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} seems to instil a reverent awe in the common denizens of Thassera.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mutant stößt leise einen schändlichen Fluch aus, blickt dich dann aber sofort verängstigt an und verstummt. Der bloße Anblick {mf|des himmlischen Herren|der himmlischen Herrin} scheint in den einfachen Bürgern von Thassera große Ehrfurcht zu wecken.{/n}
